name: Easy Media Network LLC
tag_list: press-release-services, press-release, press-release-submission, news-release, press-releases, news-press-releases
description: Easy Press Release has introduced three
overview:
Easy Press Release utilizes the best techniques of news distribution and ensures the inclusion of submitted press releases in Google news, Yahoo news etc.

Easy Press Release is a subsidiary of Easy Media Network, which offers quickest and most effective press release distribution services. With Easy Press Release, customers can be assured of instant visibility of their news releases in front of their targeted customers.

Easy Press Release has introduced three press release distribution plans for companies and agencies looking for online visibility. The press release distribution plans introduced by the company are designed as per the needs of the modern businesses and their specific needs. The three plans are Basic, Standard, and Enterprise.

Each of these distribution plans is unique with different features and categorized as per the requirements of the businesses. The plans describes category selections, distribution period, RSS distribution and many more vital features that assist businesses to gain maximum attention and online prominence.

To learn more about the quick and effective press release distribution services offered by Easy Press Release, visit http://www.easy-pressrelease.com.
